title: Design and Body
content: "The car still inherits the modern Lamborghini design, with the Y-shaped design elements such as the headlights and taillights, along with the triangular front trunk and rear engine bay. Carbon fibre is used entirely for the body panels, containing nano-tubes that can repair themselves if the factory-fitted sensors detect any small cracks and dents in the panels. The body of the car is monitored by a health system." by Wikipedia.
